<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_ar_communica_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_ar_communica_case">inflight_communication=false^state=8^notification_sent=false^assigned_toISNOTEMPTY^manual_case=false^EQ<item endquery="false" field="inflight_communication" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/><item display_value="WIP" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8"/><item endquery="false" field="notification_sent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/><item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="manual_case" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>FIN_AR_OTC_SendAckEmailForCase</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	//gs.info("@OM Added Logger 04/16");

	current.notification_sent = true;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sahi.chugh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-30 04:43:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>800cb5c21b27b300842886ae6e4bcbdb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FIN_AR_OTC_SendAckEmailForCase</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AR Communication Tool" source="x_snc_ar_communica">a682d2cedbcb37402da66165ca96193f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AR Communication Tool">a682d2cedbcb37402da66165ca96193f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_800cb5c21b27b300842886ae6e4bcbdb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-03 00:03:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=800cb5c21b27b300842886ae6e4bcbdb"/></record_update>
